description: This Java source file defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application, providing centralized handling for various exceptions and returning structured API error responses.

classes.name: ApiError
classes.description: A record that encapsulates API error details such as error type, message, status code, request path, timestamp, and validation errors.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException and returns a 404 Not Found ResponseEntity.

methods.name: handleBadRequest
methods.description: Handles BadRequestException and returns a 400 Bad Request ResponseEntity.

methods.name: handleConflict
methods.description: Handles ConflictException and returns a 409 Conflict ResponseEntity.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation exceptions (MethodArgumentNotValidException and BindException), extracts field errors, and returns a 400 Bad Request with validation details.

methods.name: handleConstraintViolation
methods.description: Handles ConstraintViolationException and returns a 400 Bad Request with violation details.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning a 500 Internal Server Error.

methods.name: buildError
methods.description: Constructs an ApiError object and wraps it in a ResponseEntity with the given HTTP status.

calls: buildError(HttpStatus, String, String, WebRequest, Map<String, String>)
